mapper.update: update t_userrole set status=#{flag} where role_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select M.* from t_user as U inner join t_userrole as R on R.permission_id=U.permission_id and R.Status=true INNER JOIN t_menu as M on M.menu_id=R.menu_id and M."Status"=TRUE where U.id=#{UserId}

select R.role_id,R.role_name,R.createtime,M.menu_name,G.permission_name from t_user as u INNER JOIN t_userrole as R on R.permission_id=u.permission_id INNER JOIN t_menu as M on M.menu_id=R.menu_id INNER JOIN t_userpermissiongroup AS G on G.permission_id=u.permission_id where u.id=#{id}
